00039 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoBaseKit.h>
00040 #include <Inventor/nodekits/SoNodeKitListPart.h>
00041 
00042 #include "CmdInsertAnalyzerKit.h"
00043 #include "InstanceNode.h"
00044 #include "SceneModel.h"
00045 #include "TAnalyzerKit.h"
00046 #include "tgf.h"
00047 
00053 CmdInsertAnalyzerKit::CmdInsertAnalyzerKit( const QModelIndex& parentIndex, TAnalyzerKit* analyzerKit, SceneModel* model, QUndoCommand* parent )
00054 : QUndoCommand("InsertAnalyzerKit", parent), m_coinParent( 0 ), m_analyzerKit(analyzerKit), m_pModel(model), m_row( -1 )
00055 {
00056     if( m_analyzerKit == 0 ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdInsertAnalyzerKit called with NULL TAnalyzerKit*" );
00057         m_analyzerKit->ref();
00058 
00059         if( !parentIndex.isValid() ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdInsertAnalyzerKit called with invalid ModelIndex." );
00060         InstanceNode* instanceParent = m_pModel->NodeFromIndex( parentIndex );
00061         if( !instanceParent->GetNode() ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdInsertAnalyzerKit called with NULL parent node." );
00062         m_coinParent = static_cast< SoBaseKit* > ( instanceParent->GetNode() );
00063 
00064 }
00065 
00069 CmdInsertAnalyzerKit::~CmdInsertAnalyzerKit()
00070 {
00071     m_analyzerKit->unref();
00072 }
00073 
00078 void CmdInsertAnalyzerKit::undo()
00079 {
00080     m_pModel->RemoveCoinNode( m_row, *m_coinParent );
00081 }
00082 
00087 void CmdInsertAnalyzerKit::redo( )
00088 {
00089     m_row = m_pModel->InsertCoinNode( *m_analyzerKit, *m_coinParent );
00090 }
